PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-09792024-08-28PCH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of CHRISTOPHE HERVIER of Rosemère, Quebec, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Nature, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Ronald Calderoni, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of CHRISTOPHE HERVIER of Rosemère, Quebec, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Nature, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Ronald Calderoni, whose term has expired.
